name: Шампунь Schauma Для Всей Семьи для всех типов волос 650мл
ingredients: aqua (water, eau), sodium laureth sulfate, sodium chloride, cocamidopropyl betaine, chamomilla recutita (matricaria) flower extract, sodium benzoate, coco-glucoside, glyceryl oleate, parfum (fragrance), citric acid, polyquaternium-10, propylene glycol, linalool, limonene
